pages.text:
Contact
.entry-header
Lost & Found
All lost & found items will be held in the
Revolution Live
box office.
Please stop by or call during the following hours to retrieve lost items:
Tuesday & Friday from 11AM-6PM.
Valid ID will be required for pickup.
For other inquiries, please contact:
info@stacheftl.com
100 S.W. 3rd Avenue
Fort Lauderdale, FL 33312
Main Phone: 954-449-1025
Fax: 954-462-9995
Email:
Info@BackyardFTL.com
.entry-content
.post-inner
.section-inner
.post

.section-inner

Private Events
.entry-header
Private Events, Corporate Events & Site Rentals
Venue Capacity
Max Capacity: 1600
Reception: 750
Seated: 300
LED lighting creates the mood in this outdoor setting complete with two large projection screens and eighteen plasma TV’s for branding and visual presentations. Take advantage of our large stage for live entertainment. Our expert talent buyers can assist with booking local bands, headline artists and  other performers.
Location, Location, Location
Backyard is located in the heart of the downtown Fort Lauderdale Riverwalk Arts and Entertainment District along with the IMAX Theatre, Broward Center for Performing Arts, Museum of Discovery and Science, Leiser Opera Center and local restaurants. Within four miles of the Broward County Convention Center, Backyard is just minutes away from beautiful beaches and the famous Las Olas Boulevard shops.
Book Your Party or Event
Private Event Software powered by Tripleseat
See Our Other Private Event Venues
Catering
Private & Corporate Events
Revolution Live, Backyard,
and Stache Drinking Den + Coffee Bar are known for exceptional food, creativity, and contemporary presentation combined with outstanding service. Our cuisine abounds with modern creations as well as the very best traditions of America to help create the perfect private and corporate events.
Backyard boasts an on-site culinary team, led by
Chef Jen Knox
. Cutting edge to traditional, custom menus and themed cuisine packages, Chef Jen Knox can accommodate any event. Beverages are served from full-service bars on two levels.
With our three distinctive venues, we can certainly provide the feel, theme, and vibe that you want! Let us impress you… AND your friends.
Fundraising & Planning
An important part of our mission at Backyard is to take an active role in our community. We work closely with all types of charities to provide a venue for you to host a successful philanthropy to raise money and create awareness.
We are also the perfect place to host your company’s next Networking Event. With our full service bars, excellent menu, and unique outdoor ambiance, we can create the perfect venue rental for you and your colleagues to mix and mingle.
Bachelorette/Bachelor Parties
Bachelorette – $25 / pp
· Basic liquor 2-hour open bar package
· Skip the entry line for everyone in your group
· Reserved table seating
· Complimentary bottle of champagne for the Bachelorette
· Specialized DJ shoutout
Bachelor – $25 / pp
· Basic liquor 2-hour open bar package
· Skip the entry line for everyone in your group
· Reserved table seating
· Round of shots for the Bachelor Party
· Specialized DJ shoutout
Contact Jade to make your party reservation!
shanel@damngoodhospitality.com
Lets Connect
Revolution Live, Backyard and
Stache Drinking Den
Office: 954 449-1028
sales@damngoodhospitality.com
.entry-content
.post-inner
.section-inner

.entry-content
.post-inner
.section-inner

About
.entry-header
We are your Backyard. Your home away from home. Ice Cold Beers, Spritzes, and Refreshing Cocktails. Come to eat, hang out, play games, drink, and socialize. All are welcome. Only good times to be had. Memories to be shared.
DIRECTIONS
FROM THE FORT LAUDERDALE/HOLLYWOOD AIRPORT
If you’re flying into the Fort Lauderdale/Hollywood Airport, you’re less than 15 minutes from Backyard
Take US 1 North to Broward Blvd
Head West bound on Broward Blvd., We’re located less than 1 Mile from US1.
SEE MAP FOR PARKING OPTIONS. ALL PARKING OPTIONS ARE WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE.
Backyard is located at 100 SW 3rd Ave
FROM THE MIAMI INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT
We estimate about 30 minutes from the heart of Miami and/or the Miami Airport.
Take FL-112 E, then take the 195 S Exit towards Downtown.
Keep left at the fork; take I-95 N and merge onto 1-95 Express. Merge onto I-95 N.
Take Exit 27 towards FL-842/Broward Blvd/Downtown
Head East bound on Broward Blvd, We’re located less than 2 Miles from I-95
SEE MAP FOR PARKING OPTIONS. ALL PARKING OPTIONS ARE WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE.
Backyard is located at 100 SW 3rd Ave
FROM WEST PALM BEACH/ANYWHERE NORTH OF FT. LAUDERDALE
Take I-95 S (via the ramp to Miami)
Take Exit 27 towards FL-842/Broward Blvd/Downtown (Keep left at fork)
Head East bound on Broward Blvd, We’re located less than 2 Miles from I-95
SEE MAP FOR PARKING OPTIONS. ALL PARKING OPTIONS ARE WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE.
Backyard is located at 100 SW 3rd Ave
FROM ANYWHERE IN THE WESTERN PART OF FLORIDA
Take I-75 S
Continue onto I-595E
Take Exit 10A toward I-95N/Ft. Lauderdale
Merge onto I-95 N
Take Exit 27 towards FL-842/Broward Blvd/Downtown
Head East bound on Broward Blvd, we’re located less than 2 Miles from I-95
AIRPORT SHUTTLE OPTIONS & OTHER TRANSPORTATION OPTIONS
Sun Trolley
— This service provides FREE shuttle service between the Fort Lauderdale airport and downtown Fort Lauderdale, but only operates on Saturdays and Sundays between 9 a.m. and 4 p.m. The final departure from downtown to the airport leaves at 4:30. The shuttle will drop you on Himmarshee Street (SW 2nd Street) downtown within walking distance to the festival.
http://www.SunTrolley.com
Check out the
Super Shuttle
to get cheap, quick, reliable access from the Miami or Fort Lauderdale airport to downtown Fort Lauderdale. (SUPER SHUTTLE DOES NOT PICK UP AT FLL)
http://www.supershuttle.com
There is also a
commuter train
for those who fly into Miami, known as the Tri-Rail Commuter Train Service. Typically you can get round trip service on the train for as little as $10 and under.
http://www.tri-rail.com
. Check out the Broward County Transit for Metro bus options, maps and schedules
http://www.broward.org/BCT
. We are located directly across the street from the central terminal.
As always,
taxis
are available at both the Fort Lauderdale and Miami Airport — they just might not be the most cost effective option!
PARKING
There are plenty of parking options for those driving to Backyard, but we do encourage carpooling to save money, gas and, obviously, the environment! Also, there are taxis and other public transportation options like the Sun Trolley in the downtown area if you’re trying to avoid driving/parking.
Please refer to our Map of parking options.
The City of Fort Lauderdale and Broward County parking garages house over 2,200 parking spaces and are within walking distance of Backyard. There are also plenty of private parking lots and garages within walking distance.
ALL PARKING OPTIONS ARE WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE.
.entry-content
.post-inner
.section-inner
.post
